title: How to factory reset the Arlo base station - Quora

response.answer_text: Performing a factory reset returns your Arlo SmartHub or Arlo base station values to the default settings. It also removes the serial number from your Arlo account. When you are going to conduct the factory reset of the Arlo base station it means you are getting back to the default setting. But remember one thing; it will delete the serial number from the Arlo account Process of Arlo base station factory reset Push and seize the reset option backside of the base station for nearly 10-15 seconds After finishing the base station reset, the front LED of the base station blinks in amber color. When LED stops blinking amber, the base station starts rebooting. If you see the internet and Power LED are deep green, go to the Arlo app on your device and login to the Arlo account. Select the New System Setup Perform actions according to the screen guidelines.

Arlo Base Station is the main part of Arlo Setup camera. With the help of Aro Base station, you can easily connect your camera to your Pc, Desktop and mobile phone. Base Station is the medium of connectivity of your connections. In case, if your Arlo Base Station Offline no need to panic just follows simple steps and fix your issues in a minimum time. The troubleshooting steps given below- Turn Off your base stationRemove the plug of Ethernet cableTo ensure that if the Internet LED lights solid then your Base Station is connected to your Device.In case, if your Internet LED lights are not solid then you need to resolve your issues.To check the Ethernet cable is Ok.To confirm that your power adapter is working properly.Try to connect your devices with another router.Recycle your base station.To ensure that your router's DHCP setting is correct.
